thread.title: BRIEF-Sidus Investment Management And BLR Partners Issue Letter To Board Of Acacia Research Corp

title: BRIEF-Sidus Investment Management And BLR Partners Issue Letter To Board Of Acacia Research Corp

organizations.name: board of acacia research corp reuters

text:
April 10, 2018 / 7:39 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Sidus Investment Management And BLR Partners Issue Letter To Board Of Acacia Research Corp Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - Sidus Investment Management LLC: 
* SIDUS INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT AND BLR PARTNERS ISSUE LETTER TO BOARD OF ACACIA RESEARCH CORPORATION 
* SIDUS INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT LLC SAYS IT AND BLR PARTNERS LP HAVE AGGREGATE OWNERSHIP OF ABOUT 4.2% OF ACACIA RESEARCH CORPâ€™S OUTSTANDING SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
